t: What It Means For Brands To Offer Whatever Price They Want On Amazon
s: March 13, 2019 - Amazon is reportedly walking back a requirement for brands to offer their best available price on Amazon.com. This would generally have positive ramifications for branded manufacturers selling on the platform. These settle into three main categories: profitability, customer ownership, and control.
